articles.title: The best Apple Watch to buy
articles.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday doesn’t officially take place until Friday, November 28th; however, if you want to shop ahead of time, we’ve rounded up the best early Black Friday deals you can already get. If you have an iPhone, the Apple Watch is the best smartwatch for you. But there was only one Apple Watch when the smartwatch launched […]
articles.author: Victoria Song

articles.title: The best Black Friday deals we’ve found on TVs, laptops, and more
articles.description: Black Friday is the most anticipated day of the year for bargain hunters. Although we still have a day or two before November 28th, we’ve already found a healthy selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, Apple’s entry-level AirPods 4 are down to a […]
articles.author: Brandon RussellSheena Vasani

articles.title: Stranger Things 5 begins with a frantic race to the finish line
articles.description: It has been a decade since the Stranger Things phenomenon began, and the Duffer brothers had had ample time to craft a strong finish to their breakout hit series. But the beginning of the show's fifth and final season feels like a frantic race to the end. While Stranger Things wasn't Netflix's first breakout hit, […]
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore

articles.title: Apple TV pulls The Hunt over plagiarism accusation
articles.description: Apple TV removed The Hunt from its streaming slate last week after concerns were raised about plagiarism. The move, previously reported by Apple Insider, comes after French media journalist Clément Garin claimed that the story closely follows Shoot, a 1974 novel written by Douglas Fairbairn. The Hunt was originally supposed to premiere on Apple TV […]
articles.author: Emma Roth

articles.title: OpenAI denies liability in teen suicide lawsuit, cites ‘misuse’ of ChatGPT
articles.description: OpenAI’s response to a lawsuit by the family of Adam Raine, a 16-year-old who took his own life after discussing it with ChatGPT for months, said the injuries in this “tragic event” happened as a result of Raine’s “misuse, unauthorized use, unintended use, unforeseeable use, and/or improper use of ChatGPT.” NBC News reports the filing […]
articles.author: Richard Lawler
